alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 8:08PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bourbon and southern Nicholas Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Sideview, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Carlisle around 820 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
